about_the_game:
Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid Lostmoon,
populated by disaster human colony. Hungry flesh eating zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Chased by hostile creatures he keeps trying to escape.
Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could help on the risky way!
Features:
  • 6 extended level zones
  • various ammunition
  • different combat tactics
  • traps and aggressive environment
  • allied and hostile characters
  • much more!
    If you like old-school platformers and slashers, thats your game

Official cheat codes:
  • IXTRA replenishes health
  • IAROS gives 100 arrows
  • IPLBT gives 100 pistol shots
  • ISUPR gives immortality for one level
  • IMGBT gives 100 rifle shots
  • IRPGS gives 100 rpgs
  • ISWOR gives 100 sword power

Disclaimer:
Author doesn’t consider available game build as the last final version. User responses and reviews are welcome and taking into account.

Version 1.024 update description
Dear all! Update to version 1.024 adds ladders to this game and fixes some minor bugs. In order to let hero climb onto these ladders new button was added to the control set. It is “UP” by default, however, could be changed in the “Settings” menu.

Version 1.023 Update description
Significant graphic and performance updates.

Version 1.022 Update description
Heroe appearance was slightly changed. Opportunity of rapid run was added.

Version 1.021 Update description:
Minor changes, fixing of usability.

Version 1.02 Update description:
Disaster cosmic pilot will encounter with HUGE troubles in our tremendous update! Changes include update in the game content and UI.

New features:
  • New mercenary enemies including rocket launcher SPG, jet pack soldiers and Minigun Boss (as well as the secret Crazy Boss in his hideout;
  • Alien enemy - meet Wormy and his acid spits!
  • Now you can save hostages and turn them into the allies;
  • More blood and gore;
  • Entirely new level - “Chemical factory”;
  • New kind of objects - toxic chemicals, which cause poisoning of game characters;
  • Several quest objects and interactions were added.

Gameplay update:
  • protagonist’s electric sword can now be discharged when fighting, making player seek for the other ways to survive until it charged.

UI updates:
  • you can now start playing from the any previously opened chapter;
  • pressing of the Escape button in the middle of the level now lets you restart level or return to the main menu.

content_descriptors.notes: The gameplay contains scenes of cartoon violence, like shooting, exploding and fighting, which are followed by appearance of painted imitations of blood and gore. Game characters including protagonist may be lethally damaged or wounded during these clashes.

Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid Lostmoon,
populated by disaster human colony. Hungry flesh eating zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Chased by hostile creatures he keeps trying to escape.
Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could help on the risky way!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Bionic Beaver
  • Processor: Dual-Core or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04 'Bionic Beaver'. Support of the other distributions is optional
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Bionic Beaver
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04 'Bionic Beaver'. Support of the other distributions is optional

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS HighSierra 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Dual-Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: It was tested on Mac OS HighSierra 10.13.6
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS HighSierra 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Inel Core i5
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB MB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: It was tested on Mac OS HighSierra 10.13.6

short_description: Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid populated by disaster human colony. Hungry zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could lead hero to freedom.
